questions.transcript: Did you get the subsequent booster shots too?

similarity_statements.transcript: I really resonate with that definitely in the early days. I feel like I was trying to balance that, you know, wanting to take in all the information, um and also wanting to, you know, I guess not scare myself crazy.

Yeah, I did the same thing. I mentioned I got my shot in October, so my my thought process the same like wanting to try to have the strongest immunity before Thanksgiving and Christmas and I knew I'd seeing a lot of people.

vaccine_importance: The participant believes that vaccines are extremely important.
